Effect Description In-Game: Maximum HP raised
Effect: Increases maximum HP by 1.1x / 1.15x

Effect Description In-Game: Maximum FP raised
Effect: Increases maximum FP by 1.1x / 1.15x

Effect Description In-Game: Lowers FP consumption
Effect: Lowers FP cost of skills, spells, and consumables by 0.9x / 0.85x

Effect Description In-Game: Maximum stamina raised
Effect: Increases maximum stamina by 1.1x / 1.15x

Effect Description In-Game: Increases runes obtained from defeated enemies
Effect: Increases rune gain by 1.1x

Effect Description In-Game: Attacks obtain a great amount of runes from enemies on rare occasions
Effect: Has a chance to gain 10,000 runes from killing enemies

Effect Description In-Game: Raises physical attack
Effect: Increases physical damage by 1.06x / 1.09x

Effect Description In-Game: Raises attacks of magic, fire, lightning, holy affinities
Effect: Increases magic, fire, lightning, and holy damage by 1.05x / 1.08x

Effect Description In-Game: Raises potency of items employing perfume
Effect: Increases the damage of perfume items by 1.2x

Effect Description In-Game: Raises potency of throwing pots
Effect: Increases the damage of pot items by 1.2x

Effect Description In-Game: Enhances roars and breath attacks
Effect: Increases the damage of roar and breath attacks by 1.2x

Effect Description In-Game: Raises potency of sorceries and incantations
Effect: Increases the damage of sorceries and incantations by 1.07x

Dormant Power: Sudden Enemy Death upon Attacks that Land
Effect Description In-Game: Attacked enemies die regardless of remaining HP on rare occasions
Effect: Has a chance to instantly kill enemies with each hit
Notes: Each enemy has an HP threshold, refer to this sheet for more information

Effect Description In-Game: Creates a glintblade which automatically attack nearby foes at regular intervals
Effect: Creates 3 giant glintblades every 18s. 100 magic attack and 10.175 poise damage per blade
Notes: Not affected by Glintblade sorcery buffs

Effect Description In-Game: Enhances attacks against dragons
Effect: Increases damage towards Draconic enemies by 1.1x and Ancient Draconic enemies by 1.05x

Dormant Power: Attack Boost [Lifeforms Born of Falling Stars]
Effect Description In-Game: Enhances attacks against blockers lifeforms born of falling stars
Effect: Increases damage towards Lifeforms Born of Falling Stars by 1.2x

Dormant Power: Attack Boost [Those Who Live in Death]
Effect Description In-Game: Enhances attacks against Those Who Live in Death
Effect: Increases damage towards Those Who Live in Death by 1.2x

Effect Description In-Game: Dragon Communion incantations add anti-dragon effect to right hand armament
Effect: Increases damage towards Ancient Draconic enemies by 1.2x and Draconic enemies by 1.3x for 45 seconds

Dormant Power: Blood Loss in Vicinity Increases Attack Power
Effect Description In-Game: Nearby blood loss increases attack power
Effect: Increases damage by 1.2x for 20 seconds when bleed is activated

Effect Description In-Game: Critical hits increase damage inflicted upon enemies
Effect: Decreases enemy damage negation by 15% for 30 seconds

Effect Description In-Game: Armament inflicts blood loss when performing critical hits
Effect: Adds 50 blood loss buildup to the weapon after critical hits

Effect Description In-Game: Enhances counterattacks unique to thrusting weapons
Effect: Increases counterhit damage by 1.2x

Effect Description In-Game: Attacks more likely to break stance of enemies
Effect: Increases poise damage by 1.1x / 1.15x

Effect Description In-Game: Extends spell effect duration
Effect: Increases the duration of buff spells by 2x

Effect Description In-Game: Newly found Sites of Grace raise attack power
Effect: Increases attack power by 1.02x for each grace discovered. Stacks up to 10 times (1.2189x total)

Effect Description In-Game: Enhances attack power depending on runes in possession
Effect: Increases damage by 1.2x at 50k runes, 1.3x at 100k, 1.9x at 900k, and 3x at 2mil

Dormant Power: Favor of Noklateo, the Shrouded City
Effect Description In-Game: Rise from near-death, unaided, a single time and become more powerful for a short time
Effect:
After being revived:
Increases HP, FP, and stamina by 1.3x for 40 seconds
Regen 5% of your max HP per second for 10 seconds
~3x faster ultimate art charge for 10 seconds

Effect Description In-Game: Halves frostbite damage and frost buildup. Nearby frostbite boosts attack.
Effect:
Reduces frostbite damage and incoming frostbite buildup by 0.5x
Increases damage by 1.15x when frostbite procs for 20 seconds

Effect Description In-Game: Boosts physical damage negation
Effect: Increases physical damage negation by 12% / 18%

Effect Description In-Game: Boosts magic, fire, lightning, and holy damage negation
Effect: Increases magic, fire, lightning, and holy damage negation by 12% / 18%

Dormant Power: Creates Holy Ground at Low HP
Effect Description In-Game: At low HP, create holy ground, slowly restore HP, and improve damage negation
Effect: Creates a holy ground when HP is below 20%. Heals for 10hp/s and increases all damage negation by 20%. Lasts for 35 seconds.

Effect Description In-Game: Raises poise
Effect: Reduces incoming poise damage by 0.75x / 0.62x

Effect Description In-Game: Raises resistance to all ailments
Effect: Increases status resistance by 57 / 75

Effect Description In-Game: Longer invincibility windows during evasive maneuvers
Effect: +3 Iframes on dodge, Duchess Backstep is +1

Effect Description In-Game: Nullifies scarlet rot and increases max HP. Attacks after receiving damage partially recover HP.
Effect: Increases maximum HP by 1.25x and attacks heal the user after taking damage for a short period of time

Effect Description In-Game: Successive attacks restore HP
Effect: Restores 3 HP on continuous attacks

Effect Description In-Game: Successive attacks restore FP
Effect: Restores 10 FP on continuous attacks

Effect Description In-Game: Successful guards restore HP
Effect: Restores 2 HP after guarding an attack

Effect Description In-Game: Successful guards restore FP
Effect: Restores 2 FP after guarding an attack

Effect Description In-Game: Critical hits restore HP
Effect: Restores [MaxHP * 0.18] HP on critical hits

Effect Description In-Game: Critical hits restore FP
Effect: Restores [MaxFP * 0.1] FP on critical hits

Effect Description In-Game: Boosts HP restoration from flasks
Effect: Increases HP gained from flasks by 1.2x / 1.3x

Effect Description In-Game: Flask slowly restores HP and provides increased HP restoration
Effect: Restores a small portion of HP + [MaxHP * 0.01] every 0.1s for 8 seconds (80% total)
Notes: When wearing "Flask Also Heals Allies," allies restore [MaxHP * 0.01] every 0.1s for 4 seconds (40% total)

Dormant Power: Poison & Rot Trigger Continuous HP Recovery
Effect Description In-Game: Poisoning or Scarlet Rot in vicinity continuously restores HP
Effect: Restores 7 HP/s for 20 seconds after poison or rot is activated

Effect Description In-Game: Raises stamina recovery speed
Effect: Increases stamina recovery by 4/s / 6/s

Dormant Power: Ultimate Art Guage Charge Speed Up
Effect Description In-Game: Improves the charging speed of Ultimate Art gauge
Effect: Increases passive Ultimate Art gauge charge by 1.06x

Effect Description In-Game: Shortens Character Skill cooldown time
Effect: Lowers character skill cooldown by 0.9x

Effect Description In-Game: Improves the charging speed of Ultimate Art gauge
Effect: Permamently increases passive ult gauge regeneration by 1

Effect Description In-Game: Using flask also restores FP
Notes: Amount of FP recovered is unknown
